item.title: Instagram
item.description: Follow @mindfulness.research for regular updates of Instagram posts on mindfulness research.

item.title: MindfulnessResearch.Space
item.description: MindfulnessResearch.Space is the landing site for the publication Scoping Review of Mindfulness Research: a Topic Modelling Approach authored by Ying Hwa Kee, Chunxiao Li, Leng Chee Kong, Crystal Jieyi Tang & Kuo-Liang Chuang. This paper was published in Mindfulness in 2019.

item.title: Postprint
item.description: You can download the postprint here.

item.description: You can access and download the resource file that features the references here.
